title: Mouse buttons is reversed in game
body: So when I installed lol on my new laptop I was confused since defult setting was now leftclick to walk. So I locked up how to change that and I found I could go into input.ini to change it, now I could move with right click, but other stuff in the game was still reversed like clicking on the mini map and clicking in the shop/menu is reversed, so i guess the game thinks MB1=MB2 and MB2=MB1? How can i fix this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try doing the following to reset your configuration to defaults.

> 1) Login to the client (**DON'T START A GAME**)
> 2) Delete your **Config** folder (this includes PersistedSettings.json and input.ini)
> 3) Go into a custom game (you should now have default settings)
> 4) Exit the custom game (your default settings will now be saved to the server)

Let me know if this helps.
